title: How to write an email to an embassy - Quora

response.answer_text: The embassy will have a contact email—-usually. That would be in your “to” area. You should include a subject matter. If you have a specific person you are emailing, you can follow convention by addressing that person as you would in a letter. Otherwise, simply state the purpose of your communication. It will be routed to the appropriate area, and you should receive a response.
